name: Planisphere
long_description:
Planisphere connects to commercial real estate analyst's inbox and helps them find the 10 deals they are interested from the 500 they receive daily.

We replace analysts paid hundreds of thousands of dollars. Turner was one of these and noticed AI was perfect for this job. We are selling this to his old boss and are working with a handful of firms to deploy our product
one_liner: The first AI-native acquisitions platform that automates dealâ€¦
